title: 谁懂Prison Professional这个插件的所有权限
txt_content:
mcbbs里面的这个插件里面的帖子炸了我搞了好久搞不懂这个插件里面的权限问题
原贴     https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/prison-professional-50-off.10592/想要这个插件的汉化文本和这个插件的权限节点

replies.author: 360导航
replies.txt_content:
机翻对照表.txt
(3.26 KB, 下载次数: 9)



2019-7-3 21:14 上传
点击文件名下载附件

这个网址链接不进去 说是无权访问（正常登陆我的spigot账号的情况下）
如果你有英文文本可以发给我帮你翻译
但如果太多我可能会懒哈哈...
这个是mcbbs里面的帖子http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-609139-1-1.html 但是里面的网站打不开

394151612 发表于 2019-7-3 21:02
这个网址链接不进去 说是无权访问（正常登陆我的spigot账号的情况下）
如果你有英文文本可以发给我帮你翻译 ...

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2019-7-12 15:39 编辑 
2458620810 发表于 2019-7-3 21:09
这个是mcbbs里面的帖子http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=redirect&goto=findpost&ptid=880545&pid=147 ...
打开了，没翻译
PrisonProfessional Permissions List

pp.admin > Allows access to the core features of /prisonprofessional
pp.achievements > Allows access to the achievements command
pp.adminmenu > Allows access to the admin menu
pp.adminmenu.viewbanned > Allows access to the view banned menu
pp.adminmenu.viewops > Allows access to the view ops menu
pp.adminmenu.viewwarns > Allows access to the view warns menu
pp.adminmenu.viewreport > Allows access to the view reported players menu
pp.adminmenu.banplayers > Allows access to the ban players menu
pp.adminmenu.warnplayers > Allows access to the warn players menu
pp.adminmenu.killplayers > Allows access to the kill players menu
pp.adminmenu.commands > Allows access to the commands menu
pp.ban.bypass > Denies access to being banned
pp.kill.bypass > Denies access to being killed
pp.alert > Allows access to the alert command
pp.apply > Allows access to the apply command
pp.bind > Allows access to binding
pp.bounty > Allows access to the bounty command
pp.enchantment.menu > Allows access to the custom enchantments menu
pp.chat > Allows access to the chat command
pp.cheese > Allows access to the cheese command
pp.cheese.bypass > Allows access to bypass the cheese cooldown
pp.clearchat > Allows access to the clearchat command
pp.crates > Allows access to the crate command
pp.crates.buy > Allows access to buying crates
pp.crates.buy.[number] > Allows access to buying a certain crate
pp.crates.give > Allows access to giving crates
pp.damage > Allows access to the damage command
pp.dropparty > Allows access to the drop party command
pp.fakedeop > Allows access to the fake de-op command
pp.fakejoin > Allows access to the fake join command
pp.fakeleave > Allows access to the fake leave command
pp.fakeop > Allows access to the fake op command
pp.gift > Allows access to the gift command
pp.gift.daily > Allows access to the daily gift
pp.gift.weekly > Allows access to the weekly gift
pp.gift.monthly > Allows access to the monthly gift
pp.hand > Allows access to the hand command
pp.hand.other > Allows access to viewing other player's hands
pp.info > Allows access to the information command
pp.info.location.other > Allows access to view another player's location
pp.info.address.other > Allows access to view another player's IP address
pp.lockchat > Allows access to the lockchat command
pp.lockchat.bypass > Allows access to bypass lockchat
pp.make > Allows access to the make command
pp.drophand.bypass > Denies having your hand dropped forcefully
pp.suicide.bypass > Denies having a forced suicide
pp.chat.bypass > Denies having you chat forcefully
pp.command.bypass > Denies having you dispatch a command forcefully
pp.message.bypass > Denis having you message a player forcefully
pp.membermenu > Allows access to open the member menu
pp.membermenu.statistics > Allows access to the statistics menu
pp.membermenu.achievements > Allows access to the achievements menu
pp.membermenu.missions > Allows access to the mission menu
pp.membermenu.spring > Allows access to the spring menu
pp.membermenu.staff > Allows access to the staff menu
pp.membermenu.information > Allows access to the information menu
pp.membermenu.commands > Allows access to the commands menu
pp.milk > Allows access to the milk command
pp.milk.bypass > Allows access to bypass the cheese cooldown
pp.minebuddy > Allows access to the mine buddy command
pp.missions > Allows access to the missions command
pp.missions.start.[number] > Allows access to start a certain mission
pp.payday > Allows access to the payday command
pp.pclearchat > Allows access to the personal clearchat command
pp.premiummenu > Allows access to the premium menu
pp.premiummenu.chat > Allows access to the chat menu
pp.premiummenu.throwing > Allows access to the throwing menu
pp.premiummenu.onlineplayers > Allows access to the online players menu
pp.premiummenu.tokenbalances > Allows access to the token balances menu
pp.premiummenu.rewards > Allows access to the rewards menu
pp.premiummenu.bounties > Allows access to the bounty menu
pp.premiummenu.commands > Allows access to the commands menu
pp.prestige > Allows access to prestige
pp.proadcast > Allows access to the proadcast command
pp.rankup > Allows access to rankup
pp.raw > Allows access to the raw command
pp.raw.broadcast > Allows access to raw broadcasting
pp.raw.message > Allows access to raw messaging
pp.report > Allows access to the report command
pp.report.view > Allows access to view reports
pp.report.clear > Allows access to clear reports
pp.sellall > Allows access to the sellall command
pp.sellall.[shop] > Allows access to sell to a certain shop
pp.send > Allows access to the send command
pp.sethealth > Allows access to the sethealth command
pp.shop > Allows access to the shop
pp.smartdrop > Allows access to smart drop
pp.smartmine > Allows access to smart mine
pp.spring > Allows access to the spring command
pp.spring.cooldown.bypass > Allows access to bypass the spring cooldown
pp.spring.limit.bypass > Allows access to bypass the spring thrust limit
pp.spring.other > Allows access to spring another player
pp.spring.other.cooldown.bypass > Allows access to bypass the spring cooldown on another player
pp.spring.other.limit.bypass > Allows access to bypass the spring thrust limit on another player
pp.staff > Allows access to the staff command
pp.statistics > Allows access to the statistics command
pp.statistics.other > Allows access to view other player's statistics
pp.throw > Allows access to the throw command
pp.throw.custom > Allows access to throw more than one thing
pp.throw.amount.bypass > Allows access to bypass the throwing limit
pp.throw.cooldown.bypass > Allows access to bypass the throwing cooldown
pp.time > Allows access to the play time command
pp.tokens > Allows access to the tokens command
pp.tokens.balance > Allows access to view your token balance
pp.tokens.balance.other > Allows access to view other player's token balances
pp.tokens.reset.all > Allows access to reset everyone's tokens
pp.tokens.reset > Allows access to reset a player's tokens
pp.tokens.pay.all > Allows access to pay everyone tokens
pp.tokens.pay > Allows access to pay people tokens
pp.tokens.give.all > Allows access to give everyone tokens
pp.tokens.give > Allows access to give player's tokens
pp.tokens.remove.all > Allows access to remove everyone's tokens
pp.tokens.remove > Allows access to remove a player's tokens
pp.tokens.setbalance.all > Allows access to set everyone's token balance
pp.tokens.setbalance > Allows access to set a player's token balance
pp.warn > Allows access to the warn command
pp.warn.bypass > Denies access to being warned
pp.antiadvertise.bypass > Allows access to bypass anti advertising
pp.antispam.bypass > Allows access to bypass anti spam
pp.antiswear.bypass > Allows access to bypass anti swear
pp.blockedphrases.bypass > Allows access to bypass blocked phrases
pp.autoinventory > Allows access to auto inventory
pp.fortuneblocks > Allows access to fortune blocks
pp.enchantment.autoinventory > Allows access to the auto inventory enchantment
pp.enchantment.invhack > Allows access to the inv hack enchantment
pp.enchantment.fortuneblocks > Allows access to the fortune blocks enchantment
pp.enchantment.autosmelt > Allows access to the auto smelt enchantment
pp.enchantment.tier > Allows access to the tier enchantment
pp.enchantment.blockexperience > Allows access to the block experience enchantment
pp.enchantment.infinity > Allows access to the infinity enchantment
pp.enchantment.luck > Allows access to the luck enchantment
pp.crates.find > Allows access to finding crates
pp.crates.open.[number] > Allows access to open a certain crate
pp.enchantment.sign > Allows access to placing enchantment signs
pp.tokens.find > Allows access to finding tokens
pp.language > Allows access to the language command复制代码
天哪 工作量太大了 没有金钱的诱惑感觉翻译不来
